word:
But I thought to pen only a few words to you; for the warning has been given us that you are both in need of moving more certainly in some things. You will need to walk very carefully, and avoid excitement and extremes. I fear that you will not now move discreetly. You should not repeat what you 


                                    -186- 

have done. Do not spread abroad writings of this character without more consideration and deeper insight as to the after-consequence of your course of action.
